item.title: Year 2024 in Retrospective
item.description: This year started the best way possible. The last 6 hours of 2023 I found myself in a new continent and in a new country that I have never visited before, Brazil. Celebrating the NYE in their capital Sao Paolo. But how did I get there? Leaving my employer To find out how I ended up in Brazil we have to go a bit more back in time. In December of 2019 I moved to Switzerland to transition my career from Product Design into Sales hired by a small software company.
